summary:
Been drawing along with Pub Draw! This is my Human Forge Cleric, Dagmar of the Mountain!
She is a beast and a half! An awkward,...
body:
Been drawing along with Pub Draw! This is my Human Forge Cleric, Dagmar of the Mountain!

She is a beast and a half! An awkward, slightly broken beast, but she’ll definitely fuck your shit up. A bit of a bull in a china shop, my girl!

summary: I really want one stretch goal oneshot to be a Molly lives AU.

I actually don’t want him to come back in canon. But I just want to explore the “what if?” scenario.

summary: I haven’t seen anything of the first campaign and I’d love to do like a watchalong or something on twitch.  It’d be basically...
body:
I haven’t seen anything of the first campaign and I’d love to do like a watchalong or something on twitch. 

It’d be basically just watching one hour of CR every day (I don’t have time for more at the moment).

I’m not sure if anybody would want to join in but I might just do it anway lol

summary:
PSA: Stop fucking asking the cast why Tiberius isn’t gonna be in the Legend of Vox Machina. 
They have good reasons for not...
body:
PSA: Stop fucking asking the cast why Tiberius isn’t gonna be in the Legend of Vox Machina.

They have good reasons for not working with Orion Acaba or using his character in a show where they’d have to recast him.

summary: i have some ideas for stretch goals
title: i have some ideas for stretch goals
body:
• $5 million: t-shirts (the people are always horny for tees)
  • $6 million: a somehow in-canon crossover with the adventure zone
  • $7 million: vox machina footie pajamas
  • $8 million: sam livestreams the burning of his outfit from gencon for everyone’s peace of mind
  • $9 million: a real bear is cast as trinket
  • $10 million: CritCon: a convention for fans of critical role
  • $11 million: CritterCon: a convention for small animals 
  • $15 million: vax is resurrected but only half of him (i havent decided which half of him)
  • $20 million: kidnap ashley from blindspot in a heist-like fashion (possibly with some bears)
  • $25 million: Francois Bertrand Jean-Luc Australia is credited as an executive producer  
  • $30 million: all $100+ backers receive one of taliesin’s relicts from his time in the 3rd century
  • $40 million: Critical Role Land!!! I wanna die in a goldfish!!
  • $50 million: all $20,000+ backers now own a cast member 

im open to constructive criticism

summary: Ok so I’m watching the fire side chat from a year ago before Campaign2 started and Matt said he had prepared long term arcs like...
body:
Ok so I’m watching the fire side chat from a year ago before Campaign2 started and Matt said he had prepared long term arcs like for level 10..

The m9 are currently Level 8. So.. Matt’s gonna fuck with us all isn’t he.
